testimonials.title: Super shocked by the information
testimonials.description: Was super shocked by the information that was available. Erazer helped me quickly search and remove my profiles. Love the detailed dashboard, it shows a better breakdown of what websites have my information and what has been removed for me.
testimonials.author: Udai Khattar, Quantitative Analyst at Chase

testimonials.title: Removed my information in a mere minutes at a low cost
testimonials.description: I love the friendly UI and ease of use, however, there are some bugs in Firefox. Having my private information protected is my main priority and a website that it basically removes in a mere minutes at a low cost is amazing to me.
testimonials.author: Nihal Alam, Researcher at NYU

testimonials.title: Definitely recommending to everyone
testimonials.description: Erazer has been such an eye-opening platform after revealing to me how much of my sensitive information is available online. Erazer efficiently located and deleted all my profiles from data brokers! Super eager to see future developments they have in store.
testimonials.author: Ranya H., Student at Hunter College

testimonials.title: The Avengers of online cleanup
testimonials.description: Erazer.io has won me over with their upfront style and a tool that's basically the Avengers of online cleanup. Going for their affordable profile detox now is like getting VIP access to a drama-free future which is smart move to keep my online rep on point.
testimonials.author: Rambajunakun Bartholowmeh Presnikasnatinapur, Digital Forensics Analyst

testimonials.title: I trust them to continue helping me
testimonials.description: WOW, this really made me worried about my familyâ€™s safety. Erazer helped me remove their info from these data brokers and I trust them to continue helping me. I would really love more features to help me better understand where all my data is and who has access to it.
testimonials.author: Samuel Chavez, Investment Banker at Morgan Stanley
